title: Natalie Brooks Secrets of Treasure House.rar
description:
Is there a better setting for an adventure game than an old house full of secret rooms and hidden corridors? No! And Natalie Brooks: Secrets of Treasure House has plenty of these and more. Join the game&#039;s intrepid heroine as she returns home following the death of her beloved grandmother to take care of the family estate, only to find herself embroiled in a mystery that will take her places she never imagine and reveal a surprise so stunning, it will change her life forever!

Natalie&#039;s destiny is in your hands as you solve classic point-and-click puzzles, search for hidden items and enjoy a dozen mini-games offering unique challenges. You&#039;ll also interact with a number of colorful characters, including a grouchy old attorney, a superstitious banker and the chief of police, whose ambitions might not align with the right side of the law! As you play, you&#039;ll be able to refer to Natalie&#039;s diary for help and use hints to solve puzzles, all while enjoying beautiful graphics and rich audio. Begin the journey today!
